name: Miniature Shaving Havoc
description:
This game lets the player understand the fun of shaving beards as part of a daily ritual.

We would like to thank AudioNetwork (https://www.audionetwork.com/) for their songs and ProSoundEffects (https://www.prosoundeffects.com/) for their Sound Effects.

Game Jam Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/miniature-shaving-havoc
